title: [LFT] Diamond 3/2 Player LF serious teams only

replies.body:
I find it funny how some people who don't care about solo queue end up high diamond and challenger and I struggle for 3000 games playing hyper carries and getting fed+farmed and taking 90% of the objectives myself end up stuck in bronze/silver.

It is just interesting...

when someone says they don't take soloq seriously, they mean that they don't play who they're best at but play more for fun than climbing. sure, i've DEFINITELY had times where i've tried my hardest to climb, but after those times i get tired of playing people im good at, and play people i want to play instead.

trying for me means giving it my 100%, studying my games and trying my best to improve. i do not do this for soloq, as soloq is basically just passing time for me.
